summary: JUMPS FORWARD SOMETIMES WITHOUT FOOT ON ACCLERATOR, ESPECIALLY WHEN MAKING TURN FROM STOPPED POSITION.  DEALERSHIP CAN NOT DUPLICATE PROBLEM.  FALSE ALLIGNMENT AT TIME OF PURCHASE.  DEALERSHIP STATES STEERING COLUMN WAS PUT IN OFF CENTER.  THIS PROBLEM WAS CORRECTED.  CREAK AND POPS IN DASH ON BOTH DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDES.  HAS BEEN TAKEN TO DEALERSHIP ON TWO OCCASIONS TO FIX PROBLEMS. NO LUCK YET.
